Title: The Best Washing Machine in the Whole World
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), K.J. Steinberg, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Old tensions between Kevin and Randall resurface, Beth discovers a secret, while Toby makes a change which knocks Kate off course.
